channel.title: New Gluon idea.
channel.description:
Alright this is going to sound strange but how about making the HEV & Health machines rechargeable by shooting at it with the gluon gun? :smiley: so you could use it to trade off uranium for armor to help your team mate. Make it more prone for teamplay by increasing the gluon's self splash damage from the past. Whenever you would want to use it for own purpose you'd be better off not standing to close or rather shoot first then charge up a 2nd time. Making it time consuming for self gaining purpose which you might not have.
Thoughts?

item.title: New Gluon idea.
item.dc:creator: vamp
item.description:
ah well had to try.
I’d just love anything that brings more focus towards teamplay.

Read full topic
